last_episode_to_air.name: Back to the Future
last_episode_to_air.overview: An unexpected visit to the hospital shifts Emma's perspective on the past 10 years — and her plans for the future.

name: If Only
overview: Follow the story of a 30-year-old woman who, when feeling dissatisfied with her marriage and family life, finds herself sent back in time 10 years following a lunar eclipse.

episodes.name: Blood Moon
episodes.overview: Emma and Nando begin to confront the reality that their marriage may be over and plan a dinner with friends at their favorite restaurant.

episodes.name: Back to Paris
episodes.overview: A vacation in Paris goes differently the second time around. Deme clears up a misunderstanding. The biggest loss of Emma's trip through time sinks in.

episodes.name: Strangers in the Night
episodes.overview: Emma celebrates her graduation, makes a big announcement and realizes that she's not the only person whose life was turned upside down by the moon.

episodes.name: Connect Moon
episodes.overview: Business is booming for Emma, Rubén and Alfredo's new company — but not everyone is enjoying the ride. Nando and Isa's wedding gets messy.

episodes.name: Nando vs. Rubén
episodes.overview: When a business trip to the countryside takes a dangerous turn, the group sees a new side of Rubén. Emma discovers that Nando is up to his old tricks.

episodes.name: Happy Birthday, Emma
episodes.overview: Emma wrestles with memories and mixed emotions as her 30th birthday brings big surprises, big hangovers and a puzzling revelation about Nando.

episodes.name: Where is Rubén?
episodes.overview: Emma gathers the people she loves for a beach getaway. New information raises even more questions about Rubén.

episodes.name: Back to the Future
episodes.overview: An unexpected visit to the hospital shifts Emma's perspective on the past 10 years — and her plans for the future.
